## Dr. Silvia-Jessica Mostacedo-Marasovic

**Discipline-Based Education Research | Water & Sustainability**

I am a discipline-based education research (DBER) scholar and water-resources management practitioner studying how learners understand water systems, sustainability, and decision-making. My work bridges geoscience education, environmental sustainability, and evidence-based instructional design.
